cards.name: Caterpie

abilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
abilities.text: This Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

cards.text: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.

cards.name: Metapod

abilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
abilities.text: This Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

cards.text: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to this Pokémon if that damage is 60 or less.

cards.name: Butterfree
cards.text: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

attacks.name: Quiver Dance
attacks.text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward. If you attached Energy in this way, heal 40 damage from this Pokémon.

cards.name: Paras
cards.text: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

cards.name: Parasect
cards.text: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mushroom spores it scatters.

attacks.name: Colorful Spores

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

cards.name: Tangela
cards.text: It tangles any moving thing with its vines. Their subtle shaking is ticklish if you get ensnared.

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

cards.name: Pinsir
cards.text: It swings its long antlers wildly to attack. During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Shellder

cards.name: Cloyster
cards.text: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

cards.name: Krabby
cards.text: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

cards.name: Magikarp
cards.text: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

attacks.name: Epic Splash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

cards.name: Gyarados
cards.text: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

cards.name: Pikachu

cards.text: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

cards.name: Slowpoke
cards.text: It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.

attacks.name: Scavenge
attacks.text: Discard a Psychic Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, put an Item card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Gastly
cards.text: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.

attacks.name: Sleep Poison
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

cards.name: Haunter

abilities.name: Gothic Fear
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may leave both Active Pokémon Confused.

cards.text: It licks with its gaseous tongue to steal the victim's life force. It lurks in darkness for prey.

attacks.name: Poison Ring
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. That Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Gengar
cards.text: Hiding in people's shadows at night, it absorbs their heat. The chill it causes makes the victims shake.

attacks.name: Sinister Fog
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Creep Show
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has 3 or more damage counters on it, that Pokémon is Knocked Out.

cards.name: Jynx

abilities.name: Victory Kiss
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may heal 10 damage from your Active Pokémon.

cards.text: It wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

attacks.name: Hug
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Meowstic-EX

abilities.name: Shadow Ear
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mind Shock
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

cards.name: Diglett
cards.text: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears aboveground.

attacks.name: Mine
attacks.text: Look at the top card of your opponent's deck. Then, you may have your opponent shuffle his or her deck.

cards.name: Dugtrio
cards.text: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.

attacks.name: Rock Tumble

cards.name: Machop
cards.text: It hefts a Graveler repeatedly to strengthen its entire body. It uses every type of martial arts.

cards.name: Machoke
cards.text: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

cards.name: Machamp

abilities.name: Fighting Fury
abilities.text: Each of your Fighting Pokémon's attacks do 20 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.text: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.

attacks.name: Machamp Crush
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Geodude
cards.text: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

attacks.name: Flail

cards.name: Graveler
cards.text: With a free and uncaring nature, it doesn't mind if pieces break off while it rolls down mountains.

attacks.name: Double-Edge
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 20 damage to itself.

cards.name: Golem
cards.text: It tumbles down mountains, leaving grooves from peak to base. Stay clear of these grooves.

cards.name: Hitmonchan
cards.text: The arm-twisting punches it throws pulverize even concrete. It rests after three minutes of fighting.

attacks.name: Bullet Punch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

cards.name: Rhyhorn
cards.text: It is inept at turning because of its four short legs. It can only charge and run in one direction.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

cards.name: Clefairy
cards.text: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

attacks.name: Moonlight
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

cards.name: Clefable
cards.text: Its hearing is so acute it can hear a pin drop over half a mile away. It lives on quiet mountains.

attacks.name: Moonblast
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

cards.name: Mr. Mime

abilities.name: Bench Barrier
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon by attacks.

cards.text: It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming.

attacks.name: Juggling
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

cards.name: Meowth
cards.text: Adores round objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

attacks.name: Exhausted Tackle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon. If tails, this Pokémon does 30 damage to itself.

cards.name: Persian
cards.text: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

cards.text: The brains in its two heads appear to communicate emotions to each other with a telepathic power.

attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Dodrio

abilities.name: Retreat Aid
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless less.

cards.text: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.

cards.name: Tauros

cards.name: Snorlax

abilities.text: If this Pokémon is Asleep, flip 2 coins instead of 1 between turns. If either of them is tails, this Pokémon is still Asleep.

cards.text: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

cards.name: Clemont

cards.name: Evosoda
cards.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.,You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

cards.text: Put a Pokémon from your discard pile on top of your deck.,You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

cards.name: Poké Ball
cards.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.,You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

cards.text: Heal 60 damage and remove all Special Conditions from 1 of your Pokémon.,You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

cards.text: Double Colorless Energy provides ColorlessColorless Energy.

cards.name: Chikorita
cards.text: Running around, climbing trees, playing hide-and-seek! Another wonderful day begins!

attacks.name: Run Around
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

cards.name: Shroomish
cards.text: I wonder if I would look a little cuter with a beautiful flower?

attacks.name: Worry Seed
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

cards.name: Charmander
cards.text: My Charmander is so rambunctious! I wonder if we can become good friends?

attacks.name: Playful
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokémon.

cards.name: Charmeleon
cards.text: My precious friend who is always with me. I have so many things I want to tell you.

attacks.name: Call for Support
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Charizard
cards.text: No matter what happens, if we stick together, we can get past it. Forever and ever.

cards.name: Snorunt
cards.text: What a delicious-looking snowman! I think I'll sneak a bite. It's OK…no one's looking, right?

cards.name: Froslass

abilities.name: Drag Along
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokémon is Knocked Out.

cards.text: Spring is already here, so goodbye…

attacks.name: Snowy Drop
attacks.text: Put 4 damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.

cards.name: Raichu
cards.text: The plan for today is to do nothing. My awesome tail is all curled up, and my ears are tired, too.

attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Pokémon on your Bench.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt

cards.name: Dedenne
cards.text: Crackle…buzz…Dedenne…?! Beep…

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Bide Barricade
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, each Pokémon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile has no Abilities (except for Psychic Pokémon).

cards.text: When she's surrounded by cushions and dressers that I like, she looks just like a princess!

attacks.name: Psychic Assault
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Gulpin
cards.text: When Mom gets in the kitchen, the happiest things happen. I can feel my mouth watering!

attacks.name: Starvin'
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

cards.name: Jirachi
cards.text: The twinkle of the stars. The destiny of love. A miracle that grants wishes in the night sky.

attacks.name: Wish
attacks.text: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Espurr
cards.text: My number one. Exceptionally cute. A little princess.

attacks.name: Twinkle
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

cards.name: Meowstic
cards.text: Intense silence. Two lamplights. Keep waiting for night to end.

attacks.name: Ear Influence
attacks.text: Move as many damage counters on your opponent's Pokémon as you like to any of your opponent's other Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.text: Does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

cards.name: Yveltal
cards.text: Hidden away in its jet-black wings is a red passion.

attacks.name: Oblivion Wing
attacks.text: Attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Darkness Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon can't attack during your next turn.

cards.name: Flabébé
cards.text: It's OK. No one will take away your flower. You look cute even when you're angry.

cards.name: Floette
cards.text: The five of us team up to be the Pretty Young Girl Force! We'll show you some beautiful moves!

attacks.name: Petal Blizzard
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

cards.name: Swirlix
cards.text: My fluffy heart makes me feel like a marshmallow. A thrilling macaron full of colorful magic. Everybody's crazy about the taste of candy! ☆

attacks.name: Lick Away
attacks.text: Remove all Special Conditions from this Pokémon.

cards.name: Slurpuff
cards.text: The cakes Slurpuff makes always look just like that one Pokémon it likes.

attacks.name: Lap Up

attacks.name: Precious Ribbon

cards.name: Diancie
cards.text: Open the magic door and a dream-colored party will start again today. I'll teach you the secret password.

attacks.name: Sparkle
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Diamond Storm
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Fairy Pokémon.

cards.name: Swablu
cards.text: Wings and beaks. I like yours, and I like mine, too.

attacks.name: Bind Wound
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Altaria
cards.text: This fluffiness makes everyone go crazy. Is it really that charming?

attacks.name: Fairy Friend
attacks.text: If you have any Fairy Pokémon on your Bench, this attack does 30 more damage.

cards.name: Fletchling
cards.text: Little friends, thanks for always helping me look so cute!

attacks.name: Warble
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fletchling, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Floral Crown
cards.text: Attach a Pokémon Tool to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it.,At the end of your opponent's turn, heal 20 damage from the Basic Pokémon this card is attached to.,You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).

cards.name: Wally
cards.text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from 1 of your Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-EX) and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward. You can use this card during your first turn or on a Pokémon that was put into play this turn.,You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).

cards.name: Flareon-EX

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Fire Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to this Pokémon.

cards.text: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Blaze Ball
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

cards.name: Pikachu
cards.text: A yellow body is proof of good health. If you touch its bright-red cheeks, you'll see its shining, smiling face!

attacks.name: Nuzzle
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

cards.name: Gardevoir-EX
cards.text: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Life Leap
attacks.text: Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shining Wind
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon has no Weakness.

cards.name: M Gardevoir-EX
cards.text: Mega Evolution rule: When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.,Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Brilliant Arrow
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Fairy Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

cards.name: Sylveon-EX
cards.text: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Dress Up
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Precious Ribbon
attacks.text: Move a Fairy Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, heal 50 damage from that Pokémon.
